Unit at the Sao Paulo

University Medical School, Sao Paulo, Brazil.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Biography” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left|color:%231e73be” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1667695500695{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”SpTitlesFull”]Director Endoscopy Unit – Cancer Institute – University of São Paulo – Brazil since 2014
Associate Professor of Department of Gastroenterology of Medical School of University of São Paulo since 2020
Associate Editor for Gastrointestinal Endoscopy 2014-2022
International Editor for Gastrointestinal Endoscopy since 2022
Chairman Scientific Comission of the Brazilian Society for Gastrointestinal Endoscopy (SOBED) 2020/2021[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row]
